mapper.select: SELECT C.CLASS_NO AS CLASSNO, TO_CHAR(CR.RSV_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RSVDATE, T.START_TIME AS RSVTIME , CR.MEM_NO AS MEMNO, C.CLASS_NAME AS TITLE, C.CLASS_POINT AS POINT , IP.MEM_NAME AS INSNAME, IP.MEM_ID AS INSID , NVL2(CR.PRC_DATE, TO_CHAR(CR.PRC_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'대기중') AS PRCDATE, CR.PRC_CODE AS PRCCODE , TO_CHAR(CRC.CNL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNLDATE, TO_CHAR(CC.CLASS_COM_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS COMDATE , CR.CLASS_RSV_NO AS CLASSRSVNO, CD.CLASS_DIS_NO AS CLASSDISNO, R.REVIEW_NO AS REVIEWNO, CC.CLASS_COM_NO AS CLASSCOMNO , CASE WHEN (CR.RSV_DATE < SYSDATE) THEN '수강완료가능' END AS COMCHECK FROM CLASS_RESERVATION CR LEFT JOIN TIME T ON CR.TIME_NO = T.TIME_NO LEFT JOIN CLASS C ON CR.CLASS_NO = C.CLASS_NO LEFT JOIN INSTRUCTOR I ON C.INS_NO = I.INS_NO LEFT JOIN INSTRUCTOR_REQUEST_PRC IRP ON I.REQ_PRC_NO = IRP.REQ_PRC_NO LEFT JOIN INSTRUCTOR_REQUEST IR ON IRP.REQ_NO = IR.REQ_NO LEFT JOIN PRIVACY IP ON IR.MEM_NO = IP.MEM_NO LEFT JOIN CLASS_RESERVATION_CANCEL CRC ON CR.CLASS_RSV_NO = CRC.CLASS_RSV_NO LEFT JOIN CLASS_COMPLETE CC ON CR.CLASS_RSV_NO = CC.CLASS_RSV_NO LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON CC.CLASS_COM_NO = R.CLASS_COM_NO LEFT JOIN CLASS_DISPUTE CD ON CR.CLASS_RSV_NO = CD.CLASS_RSV_NO WHERE CR.MEM_NO = #{memNo} ORDER BY RSVDATE DESC
mapper.insert: UPDATE CLASS_RESERVATION SET PRC_DATE=SYSDATE, PRC_CODE=2 WHERE RSV_DATE-2 < SYSDATE AND PRC_CODE IS NULL
